verbs.description: [ARG0: arsonist] [ARGM-TMP: previously] [V: set] [ARG1: fire] [ARG2: at site of massive west oakland blaze] the massive unfinished residential complex that went up in flames tuesday in west oakland was targeted by an arsonist six months prior in a smaller fire intentionally set in a stairwell of the development a city fire department official told the chronicle on wednesday ice house a group of all - electric townhomes that make up one part of a nine - building development by city ventures on west grand avenue and filbert street first caught fire april 29 in the stairwell of one of the buildings at the construction site even though the fire was quickly extinguished a senior fire department official warned superiors the next day that the site was so poorly secured it was at risk of becoming a total loss ice house nick luby ceo east bay bureau of alcohol tobacco firearms and explosives oakland fire department oakland developer atf bureau of alcohol vivekanandar illam arson official the chronicle oakland california fire department city ventures phil kerr
